item.title: Granola Bars
item.description: Ingredients 170g Soft light brown sugar 75g Golden syrup 75ml Apple juice 200g Sugar free muesli 200g Granola 200g Any combination of dried fruit/nuts/seeds Method Heat oven to 180°C or 350°F or Gas mark 4. Line a baking tray 30 x 20 cm with baking parchment. Put sugar, syrup, butter, apple juice in pan and gently bring to boil. Remove from heat and stir in all other ingredients, mix well and transfer to prepared tin, press mixture with a fork until well packed.
